emuInput.TitMainTitle: Portrait of Delores Sledge wearing dress with flowing crepe bow on shoulder, modeling hairstyle in Pittsburgh Hilton Ballroom, for Gloria Golden Grate's Hair Unlimited show
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 22, 1965, pg. 8, reads: "Gloria's Hair Unlimited Show - The golden glow of the Hilton Ballroom beamed on a double-dozen lovely models on Sunday as Gloria Grate's second hair show drew an interested throng. Shown here are several models and their intriguing hair-do's.  Top row, left to right: Rochelle Robinson wearing 'The Hill Top Tower'; June Rodgers and the mahd [mad] 'Flower Basket'; Hattie Knox shows how Golden Haze over a permanent can be 'Soft and Sophisticated'; elegant Ann Perry is just right for an evening at a formal dance.  Lower photos, left to right; Mrs. Delores Sledge wears three Fastenfast hair pieces for the 'Discotheque Look'; the 'Pre-Teen Pony Lift' is modeled by young Paulette Silvers; Beraline Crawford models 'Eastern Accent' and  last, Sandra Taylor wears one long all-over wig for the 'Free and Easy' style. - Harris Photos."
